articles.title: Better call DAVID? AI chatbot gives legal advice in Alberta personal injury cases
articles.description: DAVID, a chatbot powered by artificial intelligence, answers a call before the first phone ring even finishes. “Hi,” it says. “Did you reach out looking to speak with someone about an injury claim?” it asks, before saying the call is being recorded. It then expresses empathy.
